channel.title: TechCrunch
channel.description: The latest technology news and information on startups

item.title: Bitcoin Surges Past $95,000 as Crypto Rally Continues
item.description: Bitcoin reached new all-time highs today as institutional adoption accelerates.
item.author: Sarah Johnson

item.title: Prediction Markets Gain Regulatory Approval in New States
item.description: Several US states have approved prediction market platforms for legal operation.
item.author: Mike Chen

item.title: AI Startup Raises $100M for Market Prediction Platform
item.description: A new AI-powered prediction market platform secured major funding from top VCs.
item.author: Emily Zhang
